titleStmt.title: A caueat for the Christians agaynst the arch-papist

publicationStmt.publisher: In Foster lane by [N. Hill for] Iohn Wally,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher's name from colophon; actual printer's name and publication date from STC.
Title page border (McKerrow and Ferguson 33) has initials "J W" in the slot in the sill.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
